message: On the twit schedule, it says that there's going to be a gaming shoe brainstorm. Does anybody know anything about this?
I seem to remember that it's supposed to star Tom Merritt and Glenn Rubenstein. And that they're trying to hammer out the details of the show on the air, like Framerate and AAA did.
I don't game at all but I know many you do so I think a gaming show is long over do.
not a fan so far... then again, it's still in beta
Anyone have a link where we can watch it again? Or is there a link on TWIT?
@jonathande4 No, but they will get most of them up on twitter
@HateBadDesign @unwrangle I'll do that when I get the time. Thanks.
